Class ProxyHandlerAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.netty.channel.ChannelHandlerAdapter

            • org.tinyradius.proxy.ProxyHandlerAdapter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    io.netty.channel.ChannelHandler, io.netty.channel.ChannelInboundHandler, Lifecycle
    @Sharable
public class ProxyHandlerAdapter
extends HandlerAdapter<RadiusPacket>
implements Lifecycle
    ChannelInboundHandler that allows any RadiusPacket type and implements Lifecycle.

    • Constructor Detail

      • ProxyHandlerAdapter

        public ProxyHandlerAdapter​(PacketEncoder packetEncoder,
                           LifecycleRequestHandler<RadiusPacket> requestHandler,
                           io.netty.util.Timer timer,
                           SecretProvider secretProvider)
        Parameters:
        packetEncoder - for encoding/decoding RadiusPackets
        requestHandler - ProxyRequestHandler to handle requests. Should also implement Lifecycle as the handler is expected to manage the socket for proxying.
        timer - handle timeouts if requests take too long to be processed
        secretProvider - lookup sharedSecret given remote address
